attributes.action: Shut down pubs/bars/clubs amid the Covid-19 crisis.
attributes.additional_details: With current measures being introduced to stunt the spread of the Covid-19 virus, it makes sense for public houses and bars to follow suit and shut down to further reduce direct and indirect contact. This will protect the public from further cases, but also protects those working within the hospitality industry against those who may have the virus but do not yet show the initial signs of it.
attributes.background: With the governments decision to close down Universities and schools amid the Covid-19 crisis, is surely makes sense to close down other areas of public forum that may contribute to the spread of the virus.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
